org.franca.core.franca

Interface FTransition

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FTransitionImpl

    public interface FTransition
extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject
    A representation of the model object 'FTransition'. This class represents a single transition as part of a ref:FrancaModelAPIReference_FStateGraph[FStateGraph]. The transition references its target state by property e[to]. It doesn't reference its source state; instead, the source state contains the list of its outgoing transitions. The transition defines a e[trigger], which specifies some event which can occur during runtime. It also defines a e[guard] condition. If the trigger event occurs, the guard condition will be checked (if any). Depending on this check the transition will be executed. Finally, a transition has some e[action], which will be executed each time when the transition fires.

    The following features are supported:

    • Trigger
    • Guard
    • To
    • Action

    See Also:
    FrancaPackage.getFTransition()
